resources.string:
About the Seattle VGOC
Seattle Video Game Orchestra \8 Choir

VGOC is a Seattle based chamber ensemble dedicated to performing video game music. The VGOC consists of an orchestral ensemble, choir, and chamber groups.

We are a non-auditioning, teaching orchestra and choir, accepting members of all levels and backgrounds. We accept vocalists and instrumentalists of all kind including piano, saxophone, guitar, erhu, etc.

Love making music in your spare time? Enjoy video game music? Come join us!
